title: Supp looking for ADC or team ranked

embed.description: Avago ya mug / Silver 5 59LP / 24W 36L Win Ratio 40% / Leona - 10W 6L Win Ratio 63%, Miss Fortune - 4W 6L Win Ratio 40%, Morgana - 2W 8L Win Ratio 20%, Nami - 3W 3L Win Ratio 50%, Lulu - 3W 1L Win Ratio 75%

body:
Main Leona, Morgana, Nami and some Lulu as supports, working on Jana to increase my champ pool of supp's that i'm effective/comfortable with. My stats are all there, so can all see. 

Know other roles but mostly just 1-2 trick champs for them, as i feel this is minimum needed to understand other roles, game play, map awareness,  opportunities and when not to be dumb etc. I love the role as support, however synergy and team work is hard to find in solo and is not easy to bring game back from the dead as support, so forum i shall reach to you!

It matters not your rank, as long as you can play effectively in your role/s and as a team player/s (and not be dumb), with this can easily move through rank divisions (so i like to think anyway).
Would prefer if anyone that adds me to play a norm game or two first, just to see if our play styles fit before i go back into ranked, as i like winning. Who knows you may hate me, hahaha but i seriously doubt it!

I have Uni life on GC so cant always play, love watching the LKC (its all i ever watch) them Koreans are good even in bronze (as even in bronze they know importance of team work).

So care for a game? Add me on my ign >>>   Avago ya mug
see you guys in the rift!

replies.body:
HI im a Gold 5 prioritarily Yi Main.
But i also play ADC with Jhin.
If you want we can duo a bit and see our compatability as you look like someone who understands support pretty well.
If you want chuck me an add and we can duo a bit in flex.

Thanks

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=I%20Am%20Master%20Yi
